title: [K-12] Learning Design Decision-Making Process: Comparative Analysis of Multiple Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A non-degree program aimed at strengthening language education design capabilities in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners explain core principles of diverse instructional design approaches (4SPPIces model, 4Ts, etc.).
Learners compare and select context-appropriate instructional design approaches for given educational settings.
Learners design smartphone-constrained learning activities in project-based learning (PBL) environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
